product_goal: 本產品旨在打造一個類似電影《鋼鐵人》中「賈維斯」的自主智慧體（AGI Agent）架構，能夠圍繞人類指定的最終目標自主進行規劃、決策和行動，並透過不斷學習實現自我強化與成長。它具備持續運作的智能迴路，能主動感知環境、理解上下文，並像人類助理一樣長期協助完成複雜任務。核心目標是在概念上實現真正的通用人工智慧能力，包括：強大的長期記憶庫、深度推理與計畫能力、多模態感知與操作、多工具協作，以及開放的行動空間。最終，該智慧體將能靈活應對未知情境、跨領域解決問題，在諸如家庭助理、企業決策、自主科研等廣泛場景中發揮價值。
system_architecture_overview: 本系統採用分層自主智能體架構，將整體功能拆分為若干核心模組，並透過環狀迴路實現連續感知、思考與行動的循環。架構設計參考了認知科學中的「感知-計畫-行動」模式。系統上層包括目標管理與任務規劃單元，中層為推理決策引擎與記憶庫，下層為感知介面與行動執行單元，各模組透過共享的訊息總線與記憶體交互。整體流程如下：系統從使用者或環境接收目標與感知信息，經由內部規劃與推理產生行動方案，透過執行模組作用於環境，獲得反饋後更新內部狀態，如此反覆迭代直至最終目標達成。

tasks.title: Setup Core Project Infrastructure
tasks.description: Establish the foundational project structure, development environment, and basic architectural framework for the AGI Agent system with real-time processing capabilities and distributed cognitive architecture support.
tasks.details: Create a modular project structure to support the entire AGI architecture. Set up the Python/PyTorch environment, configure dependency management (e.g., Poetry/Pip), and establish robust logging and monitoring systems. Implement a flexible configuration management system for all modules (e.g., Planning, Reasoning, Memory, Perception, Action). Define abstract base classes and interfaces for core components to ensure modularity and extensibility. Set up a comprehensive testing framework (e.g., pytest) and a CI/CD pipeline for automated quality assurance. Build specialized infrastructure for real-time scheduling, distributed consensus, hardware acceleration, and inter-layer cognitive communication to support AGI-specific requirements.

Set up Celery/RQ or custom async task queue system, implement worker base classes, and design scalable task distribution patterns
<info added on 2025-06-26T17:23:01.483Z>
Successfully implemented a robust distributed computing infrastructure featuring:

The BaseWorker abstract class provides a foundation for all worker implementations with built-in status tracking, comprehensive metrics collection, and centralized error handling. This ensures consistent behavior across different worker types.

The TaskQueue implementation offers thread-safe priority queue functionality with automatic task expiration, configurable retry mechanisms with exponential backoff, and real-time statistics tracking for performance monitoring.

The Coordinator serves as the central orchestration hub, managing worker pool lifecycles, intelligent task distribution based on worker capabilities and current load, and aggregating results from distributed workers.

The WorkerPool system enables dynamic pool management with auto-scaling capabilities that respond to workload changes, continuous health monitoring with automatic worker restart on failure, and graceful scaling operations to prevent task loss.

Seamless integration with the existing Celery infrastructure ensures backward compatibility while allowing gradual migration to the new system. The implementation supports priority-based scheduling for critical tasks, automatic retry logic with configurable backoff strategies, comprehensive health checks with self-healing capabilities, and detailed metrics collection for monitoring and optimization.

All components are designed with thread safety as a core requirement, implement clean shutdown procedures to prevent data loss, and are covered by an extensive test suite including both unit and integration tests to ensure reliability and maintainability.

tasks.title: Implement Reasoning and Decision Module
tasks.description: This is the system's 'brain,' responsible for fine-grained thinking, reasoning, and real-time decision-making for each task stage with AGI-level meta-cognitive capabilities. It ensures every action is logically sound, self-aware, and serves the long-term goal while meeting strict latency requirements.
tasks.details: For each sub-task, this module will use its built-in logic engine (combining symbolic computation with neural networks like GPT models) to perform 'chain-of-thought' reasoning with real-time constraints. System 1 (Neural) provides intuitive reasoning under 50ms, while System 2 (Symbolic) handles deliberative reasoning under 500ms. The module includes meta-reasoning capabilities for self-monitoring, confidence estimation, and strategy selection. It analyzes task-relevant information, predicts consequences, evaluates plans, and selects optimal actions while maintaining consciousness layer integration for transparency and self-awareness. The system adapts its decision-making strategy dynamically while recording reasoning traces for continuous learning.
tasks.testStrategy: Benchmark tests for reasoning speed (System 1: <50ms, System 2: <500ms, Hybrid: <100ms) and accuracy, integration tests for neural-symbolic coordination, meta-reasoning validation tests, consciousness layer API tests, introspection capability tests, and validation using logical reasoning datasets and causal inference problems.

tasks.title: Develop Memory and Knowledge Module
tasks.description: Provides the agent's long-term and short-term memory functions for storing and retrieving all task-related information, allowing the agent to accumulate experience and become more knowledgeable and efficient over time. Supports distributed AGI deployment with real-time performance constraints and multi-agent memory sharing.
tasks.details: The memory system is composed of working memory (short-term) and long-term memory in a distributed architecture. Working memory temporarily stores the current conversation context, recent observations, and intermediate reasoning results with < 10ms access latency. Long-term memory persistently stores general knowledge, lessons learned, and past task records across distributed nodes. The module provides read/write interfaces for the Reasoning Module to access memories with coherence guarantees. It implements memory consolidation and compression mechanisms to extract key knowledge, eliminate redundancy, and prevent unlimited memory growth. Includes distributed consistency protocols, real-time access constraints, and multi-agent memory sharing capabilities.
tasks.testStrategy: Memory capacity tests for each layer, retrieval accuracy tests with various similarity metrics, consolidation tests simulating offline processing, forgetting mechanism validation, distributed coherence tests, latency benchmarks (working memory < 10ms, short-term < 50ms, long-term < 200ms), and multi-node synchronization tests.

subtasks.title: Create Social Behavior Model
subtasks.description: Develop a model that captures and predicts social interactions, agent intentions, and multi-agent dynamics
subtasks.details: Build theory of mind components, social graph representations, intention recognition modules, and multi-agent behavior prediction. Include modeling of cooperation, competition, and communication patterns

subtasks.title: Implement Causal Graph Learning
subtasks.description: Build algorithms to discover causal relationships between variables in the environment from observational and interventional data
subtasks.details: Implement causal discovery algorithms like PC, GES, or NOTEARS. Include structure learning, causal effect estimation, and handling of confounders. Support both discrete and continuous variables

subtasks.title: Build Prediction Engine
subtasks.description: Create a unified prediction system that leverages physical, social, and causal models for multi-step forecasting
subtasks.details: Integrate world models with ensemble methods, implement rollout mechanisms, handle different prediction horizons, and combine predictions from multiple model types with appropriate weighting. Ensure prediction generation completes within 150ms for real-time requirements

subtasks.title: Develop Counterfactual Reasoning Module
subtasks.description: Implement algorithms for counterfactual inference to answer 'what-if' questions about alternative actions or scenarios
subtasks.details: Build counterfactual generation using structural causal models, implement twin network approaches, create intervention simulators, and develop counterfactual explanation generation

subtasks.title: Create Model Update Mechanisms
subtasks.description: Design adaptive learning systems that continuously update world models based on new experiences and feedback
subtasks.details: Implement online learning algorithms, experience replay with prioritization, model disagreement detection, active learning for targeted exploration, and catastrophic forgetting prevention

subtasks.title: Implement Uncertainty Quantification
subtasks.description: Build comprehensive uncertainty estimation for all model components including epistemic and aleatoric uncertainty
subtasks.details: Implement Bayesian neural networks, ensemble uncertainty, prediction intervals, uncertainty propagation through causal graphs, and confidence calibration methods

subtasks.title: Develop Model Visualization and Debugging Tools
subtasks.description: Create interactive visualization and analysis tools for understanding, debugging, and explaining world model behaviors
subtasks.details: Build latent space visualizers, causal graph renderers, prediction trajectory plots, uncertainty heatmaps, counterfactual comparison views, and model disagreement analyzers

subtasks.title: Implement Distributed World Model Synchronization Protocol
subtasks.description: Create a protocol for synchronizing world models across multiple distributed AGI instances with low latency
subtasks.details: Design and implement a distributed synchronization protocol that ensures world model updates propagate within 200ms. Include delta compression, prioritized updates, network fault tolerance, and efficient serialization formats for model states

subtasks.title: Create Multi-Agent Belief Reconciliation System
subtasks.description: Build a system for reconciling beliefs and observations between multiple AGI agents with potentially conflicting world views
subtasks.details: Implement belief merging algorithms, trust-weighted consensus mechanisms, epistemic conflict detection, and belief revision protocols. Support both cooperative and adversarial scenarios

subtasks.title: Build World Model Versioning and Branching System
subtasks.description: Develop a version control system for world models supporting branching, merging, and rollback operations
subtasks.details: Create a Git-like versioning system for world models with efficient diff algorithms, branch management, merge conflict resolution, and checkpoint/restore capabilities. Include semantic versioning for model compatibility

subtasks.title: Develop Consensus Mechanisms for Contradictory Observations
subtasks.description: Implement algorithms for reaching consensus when multiple agents observe contradictory information
subtasks.details: Build Byzantine fault-tolerant consensus protocols, implement voting mechanisms weighted by agent reliability, create contradiction detection algorithms, and develop graceful degradation strategies

subtasks.title: Implement Distributed Causal Graph Management
subtasks.description: Create a distributed system for managing and synchronizing causal graphs across multiple AGI instances
subtasks.details: Implement distributed graph databases for causal models, create conflict-free replicated data types (CRDTs) for causal edges, build causal inference query distribution, and ensure <100ms query completion times

subtasks.title: Build Distributed Truth Maintenance System
subtasks.description: Develop a distributed system for maintaining consistent truth values across multiple AGI instances
subtasks.details: Implement assumption-based truth maintenance, create justification networks, build dependency tracking across agents, and develop efficient belief propagation algorithms for distributed settings

subtasks.title: Optimize Real-Time Performance
subtasks.description: Ensure all critical world model operations meet strict latency requirements for real-time AGI operation
subtasks.details: Optimize model update propagation to <200ms, causal inference queries to <100ms, and prediction generation to <150ms. Implement caching, pre-computation, model compression, and hardware acceleration as needed

tasks.title: Develop Continuous Learning and Self-Optimization Framework
tasks.description: This module gives the agent the ability to self-reflect and improve, which is key to its long-term growth. It enables the agent to 'get smarter with use.'
tasks.details: This module continuously monitors the agent's internal state and external performance, evaluating the effectiveness of current plans and actions. If it detects deviations (e.g., task failure), it triggers a 'reflection mechanism' to analyze the cause of failure and feeds insights back to the Planning and Reasoning modules to correct strategies in the next cycle. This includes real-time learning, offline deep learning from accumulated experience, and module evolution to incorporate new technologies.
tasks.testStrategy: Learning efficiency tests with few-shot scenarios, adaptation speed tests in new domains, knowledge retention tests, and meta-learning improvement measurement.

subtasks.title: Implement Experience Collection System
subtasks.description: Create a system to capture and store agent experiences including state-action pairs, outcomes, and contextual information
subtasks.details: Design data structures for experience storage, implement experience buffer with configurable retention policies, create APIs for experience submission from various agent components, and ensure efficient serialization/deserialization

subtasks.title: Build Reflection and Pattern Extraction Module
subtasks.description: Develop algorithms to analyze collected experiences and extract meaningful patterns, insights, and generalizable knowledge
subtasks.details: Implement statistical analysis for pattern detection, create clustering algorithms for similar experiences, develop anomaly detection for unusual patterns, and build summarization techniques for experience compression

subtasks.title: Design Knowledge Integration Mechanism
subtasks.description: Create a system to integrate extracted patterns and insights into the agent's existing knowledge base without catastrophic forgetting
subtasks.details: Implement elastic weight consolidation or similar techniques, design knowledge graph updates with conflict resolution, create incremental learning strategies, and develop knowledge versioning system

subtasks.title: Develop Experience-based Learning Engine
subtasks.description: Build a learning system that can improve agent behavior based on past experiences and outcomes
subtasks.details: Create experience replay mechanisms, implement prioritized experience sampling, develop credit assignment algorithms, and build performance metrics for learning effectiveness

subtasks.title: Create Imitation Learning Pipeline
subtasks.description: Implement a system for the agent to learn from demonstrations or examples of successful behavior
subtasks.details: Build demonstration recording and parsing system, implement behavioral cloning algorithms, create inverse reinforcement learning components, and develop demonstration quality assessment metrics

subtasks.title: Implement Reinforcement Learning Module
subtasks.description: Develop a reinforcement learning system for the agent to learn optimal policies through trial and error
subtasks.details: Implement value-based and policy-based RL algorithms, create reward shaping mechanisms, develop exploration strategies, and build safe RL constraints to prevent harmful actions

subtasks.title: Build Meta-Learning Optimizer
subtasks.description: Create a meta-learning system that learns how to learn more efficiently across different tasks and domains
subtasks.details: Implement model-agnostic meta-learning (MAML) or similar algorithms, develop task distribution modeling, create few-shot learning capabilities, and build transfer learning mechanisms

subtasks.title: Design Active Learning Strategy System
subtasks.description: Implement strategies for the agent to actively seek out learning opportunities and identify knowledge gaps
subtasks.details: Create uncertainty estimation methods, implement query generation for information seeking, develop curiosity-driven exploration, and build cost-benefit analysis for learning actions

subtasks.title: Create Knowledge Validation and Testing Framework
subtasks.description: Build a comprehensive system to validate learned knowledge and ensure continuous improvement without degradation
subtasks.details: Implement automated testing of learned behaviors, create regression detection mechanisms, develop performance benchmarking suite, and build knowledge consistency verification tools

tasks.title: Build Natural Interaction Interfaces
tasks.description: Create an intuitive multi-modal interaction system with voice, text, gesture recognition, contextual awareness, and personalized adaptation.
tasks.details: Implement natural language processing for conversational interactions with context awareness and dialogue management. Create a voice interface with speech recognition, NLU, and speech synthesis. Build gesture and facial expression recognition for non-verbal communication. Develop a contextual awareness system that understands user state, environment, and situational factors. Implement a personalization system that learns user preferences and communication styles. Create proactive interaction capabilities to provide timely assistance.
tasks.testStrategy: Conversation quality tests with human evaluators, voice recognition accuracy in various conditions, gesture recognition precision tests, context understanding validation, and user satisfaction surveys.

subtasks.title: Implement Conversational NLP Interface
subtasks.description: Build natural language processing system for understanding and generating human-like conversations
subtasks.details: Develop intent recognition, entity extraction, dialogue management, and response generation components. Integrate with language models for context-aware conversations.

subtasks.title: Develop Voice Recognition and Synthesis System
subtasks.description: Create voice input/output capabilities for speech-based interactions
subtasks.details: Implement speech-to-text engine, text-to-speech synthesis with natural prosody, voice activity detection, and multi-speaker identification.

subtasks.title: Build Gesture Recognition System
subtasks.description: Develop computer vision system to interpret human gestures and body language
subtasks.details: Create pose estimation, hand tracking, gesture classification, and real-time gesture interpretation modules using camera inputs.

subtasks.title: Create Facial Expression Analysis Module
subtasks.description: Implement facial recognition and emotion detection capabilities
subtasks.details: Develop facial landmark detection, emotion classification, micro-expression analysis, and gaze tracking components for understanding user emotional states.

subtasks.title: Develop Contextual Awareness Module
subtasks.description: Build system to understand and maintain context across interactions
subtasks.details: Create context modeling, situation awareness, environmental understanding, and cross-modal context fusion to enable appropriate responses.

subtasks.title: Implement Personalization Engine
subtasks.description: Create adaptive system that learns and personalizes to individual users
subtasks.details: Build user profiling, preference learning, behavior adaptation, and personalized response generation based on interaction history.

subtasks.title: Build Proactive Interaction System
subtasks.description: Develop capability for AI to initiate relevant interactions
subtasks.details: Implement opportunity detection, relevance scoring, timing optimization, and proactive suggestion generation based on context and user patterns.

subtasks.title: Create Collaborative Task Coordination System
subtasks.description: Enable AI to work cooperatively with users on complex tasks
subtasks.details: Develop task decomposition, role assignment, progress tracking, and collaborative planning capabilities for human-AI teamwork.

tasks.title: Implement Multi-Layer Security, Safety, and Ethics Framework
tasks.description: Build a comprehensive security and safety system with Constitutional AI, behavior monitoring, human oversight, and emergency protocols to minimize risks and ensure trustworthy operation.
tasks.details: Implement a multi-layer security architecture: 1) Hardcoded safety rules (immutable), 2) Constitutional AI for value alignment, 3) Behavior monitoring with anomaly detection, 4) Human supervision interfaces, and 5) Emergency stop protocols. This includes a decision tracking system, causal explanations for actions, uncertainty expression, comprehensive audit logging, and robust privacy protection mechanisms (data minimization, encryption, user control). The goal is to ensure the agent is safe, reliable, and aligned with human values.
tasks.testStrategy: Security penetration testing, value alignment validation with ethical scenarios, behavior monitoring accuracy tests, human oversight interface usability tests, and privacy compliance audits.

subtasks.title: Implement hardcoded safety rules implementation
subtasks.description: Create a robust system for defining and enforcing non-negotiable safety constraints that prevent harmful actions
subtasks.details: Design rule engine for safety constraints, implement rule validation system, create configuration interface for safety rules, add real-time rule enforcement during AI decision-making, implement override protection mechanisms

subtasks.title: Build Constitutional AI framework
subtasks.description: Develop a principles-based AI alignment system that guides behavior through constitutional values
subtasks.details: Define constitutional principles hierarchy, implement principle evaluation engine, create conflict resolution mechanisms, build principle learning system, integrate with decision-making pipeline

subtasks.title: Create behavior anomaly detection system
subtasks.description: Build machine learning models to detect unusual or potentially harmful AI behaviors in real-time
subtasks.details: Implement baseline behavior profiling, create anomaly detection algorithms, build real-time monitoring pipeline, develop alert thresholds and escalation, integrate with safety rule system

subtasks.title: Design human oversight interfaces
subtasks.description: Create intuitive interfaces for human operators to monitor and intervene in AI operations
subtasks.details: Build real-time monitoring dashboard, implement intervention controls, create approval workflow system, design alert notification system, develop operator training materials

subtasks.title: Implement emergency stop protocols
subtasks.description: Create fail-safe mechanisms to immediately halt AI operations when safety risks are detected
subtasks.details: Design multi-level shutdown procedures, implement graceful degradation systems, create manual override controls, build state preservation for recovery, test emergency scenarios

subtasks.title: Build decision tracking system
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive logging of all AI decisions with full context and rationale
subtasks.details: Implement decision capture pipeline, create structured logging format, build decision replay capability, develop search and query interface, integrate with audit system

subtasks.title: Develop causal explanation generator
subtasks.description: Build interpretability tools that explain AI decisions in terms of causal relationships
subtasks.details: Implement causal graph construction, create explanation generation algorithms, build natural language explanation system, develop visualization tools, validate explanation accuracy

subtasks.title: Create uncertainty quantification module
subtasks.description: Implement systems to measure and communicate AI confidence levels and uncertainty
subtasks.details: Build probabilistic reasoning framework, implement confidence scoring algorithms, create uncertainty visualization, develop threshold-based actions, integrate with decision system

subtasks.title: Build audit logging infrastructure
subtasks.description: Create tamper-proof logging system for all safety-relevant events and decisions
subtasks.details: Implement immutable logging architecture, create cryptographic verification, build log analysis tools, develop compliance reporting, ensure regulatory adherence

subtasks.title: Implement privacy protection module
subtasks.description: Build comprehensive privacy safeguards for all data processed by the AI system
subtasks.details: Implement data anonymization techniques, create differential privacy mechanisms, build consent management system, develop data retention policies, ensure GDPR/CCPA compliance

tasks.title: Create Self-Evolution and Improvement System
tasks.description: Implement controlled self-modification capabilities with a Constitutional AI framework, recursive improvement, and capability expansion mechanisms, ensuring the system evolves safely and effectively.
tasks.details: Build a Constitutional AI framework with predefined, non-overridable ethical and behavioral guidelines. Implement a self-criticism system to evaluate output quality against internal standards. Create a self-improvement mechanism that optimizes behavior based on feedback within strict safety boundaries. Develop limited, safe code self-modification for performance optimization. Implement dynamic architecture adjustment and a capability expansion system that acquires new skills while ensuring alignment with core values.
tasks.testStrategy: Constitutional constraint validation tests, self-improvement effectiveness measurement, code modification safety tests, and long-term stability monitoring.

subtasks.title: Design Constitutional AI constraint system
subtasks.description: Create a robust framework for defining and enforcing safety constraints that guide all self-modification decisions
subtasks.details: Implement hard constraints for value alignment, safety boundaries, and modification limits. Include formal verification methods for constraint satisfaction and multi-layered validation systems

subtasks.title: Implement self-criticism evaluation module
subtasks.description: Build system for AI to critically evaluate its own outputs, decisions, and proposed modifications
subtasks.details: Develop adversarial self-testing, bias detection, failure mode analysis, and performance regression testing. Include mechanisms for identifying edge cases and potential harm scenarios

subtasks.title: Create feedback-based improvement mechanism
subtasks.description: Design system to collect, process, and integrate feedback for continuous improvement
subtasks.details: Implement multi-source feedback collection (user, automated metrics, self-evaluation), weighted feedback aggregation, and safe integration protocols with validation before applying changes

subtasks.title: Build safe code modification system
subtasks.description: Develop secure mechanisms for modifying system code while maintaining safety guarantees
subtasks.details: Create sandboxed testing environments, formal proof systems for modifications, gradual rollout mechanisms, and cryptographic signing for authorized changes with immutable audit logs

subtasks.title: Implement dynamic architecture adjustment
subtasks.description: Create framework for safely modifying system architecture and adding new components
subtasks.details: Design modular architecture with safe insertion points, dependency management, resource allocation controls, and architectural invariant preservation during modifications

subtasks.title: Develop capability expansion framework
subtasks.description: Build system for safely adding new capabilities while preventing harmful emergent behaviors
subtasks.details: Implement capability isolation, staged testing protocols, interaction effect analysis, and conservative expansion policies with mandatory safety reviews for new capabilities

subtasks.title: Create safety verification system
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive safety testing and verification for all modifications
subtasks.details: Build formal verification tools, adversarial testing frameworks, value alignment checks, and multi-agent safety reviews with Byzantine fault tolerance

subtasks.title: Implement performance monitoring system
subtasks.description: Create real-time monitoring for system health, safety metrics, and performance indicators
subtasks.details: Deploy comprehensive telemetry, anomaly detection, performance regression tracking, and safety metric dashboards with automated alerting for constraint violations

subtasks.title: Build rollback mechanisms
subtasks.description: Develop fail-safe systems to revert modifications if safety issues are detected
subtasks.details: Implement versioned state management, instant rollback triggers, partial rollback capabilities, and guaranteed recovery paths with minimal service disruption

subtasks.title: Establish long-term stability assurance
subtasks.description: Create systems to prevent value drift and maintain alignment over extended self-modification cycles
subtasks.details: Implement value lock-in mechanisms, drift detection algorithms, periodic alignment verification, and immutable core value preservation with mathematical guarantees

tasks.title: Create Unified Cognitive Architecture Coordinator
tasks.description: Implement the overarching system coordinating all four cognitive layers (consciousness, reasoning, knowledge, perception) to achieve true AGI capabilities with real-time event-driven architecture and emergent behavior detection.
tasks.details: Design and implement a four-layer cognitive architecture framework with hierarchical coordination: 1) Consciousness Layer - Meta-cognitive capabilities for self-awareness, introspection, and high-level goal alignment. Implement consciousness state tracking, attention mechanisms, and meta-reasoning interfaces. 2) Reasoning Layer Integration - Create bidirectional communication protocols with the reasoning module (Task 2) for System 1/2 coordination and meta-reasoning feedback loops. 3) Knowledge Layer Integration - Interface with memory systems (Task 3) for cognitive state persistence, experience replay, and knowledge-guided decision making. 4) Perception Layer Integration - Connect with multi-modal perception (Task 4) for sensory integration and attention-driven perception filtering. Build an event-driven message bus using Apache Kafka or RabbitMQ for inter-layer communication with <10ms latency. Implement cognitive state management with Redis for real-time state tracking and PostgreSQL for historical analysis. Create emergent behavior detection using pattern recognition algorithms and anomaly detection (Isolation Forest, LSTM autoencoders). Develop cognitive load balancing with dynamic resource allocation based on task complexity and available computational resources. Build self-awareness monitoring with introspection APIs, performance metrics, and consciousness level indicators. Implement graceful degradation strategies for layer failures with fallback mechanisms and partial functionality modes. Create comprehensive visualization tools using D3.js or Plotly for real-time cognitive state monitoring and debugging interfaces.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for each cognitive layer interface with mock implementations. Integration tests for inter-layer communication protocols measuring message latency (<10ms requirement). Consciousness state consistency tests with concurrent operations. Emergent behavior detection validation using synthetic behavioral patterns. Load balancing effectiveness tests under various cognitive load scenarios. Self-awareness accuracy tests comparing internal state reports with external observations. Failure injection tests for each layer to validate graceful degradation. End-to-end cognitive task execution benchmarks. Visualization tool usability tests with cognitive state replay capabilities. Performance benchmarks for real-time event processing throughput (>10,000 events/second).
